input.sentences: this boy is opening up his birthday gifts but he has to read the cards first .
he is so happy to get the legos he wanted .
he also get a new jersey that he puts on immediately .
the whole family poses before they eat the cake .
output.sentences: He reads the cards off all his gifts before opening them.
He is so happy he got legos.
The next gift he opens is a jersey and he immediately puts it on.
It's time for the cake so he blows out the candles.
His family takes a moment and poses for a photo before they eat the cake.
